verses.content: Zâwlnei Jeremia hmanga, Kal- daihai ram chungthu, Babulon chungthua LALPA thuhril chu:

“Hnamhai laia chun hril la, phuong rawh, chun, puonzâr chu khai la, phuong la, thup naw rawh, ‘Babulon chu lâkin a um a, Bêl chu sukzak a na, Merodak chu a bei- dawng a, a milimhai po po chu sukzakin an um a, a milimhai chu an beidawng zo tah,’ ti rawh.
Hmârtienga inthawk chun hnam pakhat a ram chu râusana siema tukhawm chêng lo dinga siem dingin a hung mêk a; an tlânseh a, mihriem le ramsahai khawm chu, an fe hmang zo tah a.
Chuong niahai chun, chuong hunahai chun, LALPA chun a tih: Israel thlahai chu hung an ta, anni le Juda thlahai chu a ruolin hung an ta; an ṭap malamin hung an ta, LALPA an Pathien chu zawng an tih.
Hma sawngin Zion chu râwn an ta, ‘Hung ve ro, theinghila um ta ngai lo ding chatuon thuthlung chun LALPA chu hung zawm ve ro khai,’ tîng an tih.

“Ka mihai chu berâm inhmang- hai an lo ni tah a, an vêngtuhai chun anni chu tlângahai chun inherhmang- tirin, an ṭhuoi hmang a; tlânga in- thawkin muola dâm chun an fe a, an riekna hmun chu an theinghil tah a.
A hmu taphawthai hlak chun anni chu an fâkzo a, an hmêlmahai chun, ‘Thudik umna LALPA, an thla- tuhai beiseitak, LALPA chunga chun thil an suksuol lei a nih, ei sukpawi nawh,’ an tih a.
Babulona inthawk chun tlânsuok unla, Kaldaihai rama inthawk chun fe suok unla, kêl ruol hmaa kêlchal ang ni ro.

Ngai ta u, hmârtieng rama inthawka hnam ropuitak inkhâwm chu Babulon hung rûn dingin hung chawktho ka ta, in hungtir ka tih; a chunga chun hung intlar an ta; chutaka inthawk chun lâkin um a ta, an thalhai chu mi hrât indo thiemtak a thlâwna kîr nâwk ngai naw ang a nih.
Chuongchun, Kaldai chu râllâk- sum hung nîng a ta, ama suksetuhai taphawt chu lungawi êm êm an tih, LALPA chun a tih.
Aw nangni ka rochan hung rûntuhai, in hlima in lâwm lei le, sazukpui bu chilse a, sakawr hrâttak inhrâm anga in tha a fân leiin; in nu chu nasatakin inzak a tih;
nangni neitu cheu chu buoi a ta, ngai ta u, hnam po poa hnuoihnung tak, thlalêr le, ram ṭâwl le fienriel hmun nîng a tih.
LALPA lunginsenna lei chun hluoin um naw nih a, a pumpuia râusan nîng a ta, mi tin Babulon fekhêltuhai phawt chun mak tîng an ta, a sietna po poa chun inchek an tih.
Babulon chu a vêlin nangni khawma intlar khum ro, thalngul kuoituhai, ama chu kâp unla, thal chu ren naw ro, LALPA chungah thil a lo suksuol ta sih a.

A vêlin ama chu khêkkhum unla; ama chu a hung inpêklût tah a, a kulhai chu a chim a, a banghai chu sukchim an na. Lalpa phubalâkna a ni sih a; ama chunga chun phuba la unla, amain a lo thaw ta ang khan a chunga khawm thaw ve ro.

Babulona inthawk chu chi thetu chu sât thla unla, busîk laia kâwite hmangtu le chun; nêksâwrna kâwl- hnâm ṭi leiin mi tin chu mâni mihai tiengah kîr seng an ta, mi tin chu mâni rama seng chun tlân an tih.

“Israel chu berâm indar a nih: sakeibakneihai chun ama chu an lo hnawt hmang tah a; a hmasatak chun Assuria lal chun anni chu a fâkzo a; a tâwpah Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar hin a ruhai chu a sukthliek tah a.
Chuleiin, sipaihai LALPA Israel Pathien chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta u, Assuria lal ka hrem ang bawk khan Babulon lal le a ram chu ka hrem ding a nih.
Israel chu a tlatna hmuna chun hung ṭhuoi nâwk ka ta, Karmel le Basana chun tlâng a ta, a thla chu Ephraim le Gilead tlângahai chun lungawi tâwk tâng a tih.

Chuong niahai chun, chuong pha chun, LALPA chun a tih: Israel suolna chu zawng nîng a ta, ieng- khawm um naw ni; chun, Juda suolna khawm chu hmu ni ta naw nih a; a mahla anga ka hla tahai chu ka ngaidam ding a ni sih a.
“Merathaim ram chu, chu ngei chu, Pekod hluotuhai le chun hang rûn ro; anni chu that unla, sukbo- hmang vawng ro, LALPA chun a tih: thu ka pêk ang tak cheu chun thaw unla.
Suksietna ropuitak le, indona ri chu rama chun a um a.
Hnuoi chung po po tubau iengtiziea tlieka innawi el am a ni aw! Iengtiziea Babulon chu hnamhai laia chun râusana um el am a ni aw!
I ta dingin châng ka kam a, i âwk a ni tah, aw Babulon, i lo inring nawh a, LALPA chu i kal leiin hmu suokin i um a, manin i um an tah.
LALPA chun a râlthuom sie- khâwmna chu a hawng a, a lungin- senna hriemhreihai chu a hung lâk suok a, LALPA sipaihai LALPA chun Kaldaihai rama chun thaw ding a nei sih a.
Kil tina inthawk chun ama chu hung rûn unla, a siekhâwmna inhai chu hawng unla, ama chu pil dêng pâwng angin dêng pâwng unla, sukse letdêr ro; a ieng iengkhawm hlain um naw raw se.

A bâwngchalhai po po chu that vawng unla, sa thattu kuomah infetir ro; an chung a va rik de! an ni, anni hung hremna hun chu a hung tlung ta sih a. Babulon rama inthawka tlân- sea suokthlenghai râwlhai chu e!
“LALPA ei Pathien phubalâkna a biekin phubalâkna ngei chu Ziona hril ding a nih.

“Thalkâptuhai, thalngul kuoi- hai po po chu Babulon chunga chun ko khâwm ro; a vêl el chun riekngha unla, chutaka inthawk chun tu- khawm insuokthlengtir naw ro; a sinthaw ang pei chun ama chu thung unla, a lo thaw ta ang tak khan ama chungah thaw ve ro; LALPA chungah, Israel Mi Inthieng chunga chun a lo chapo ta sih a.
Chuleiin, a tlangvâlhai chu a kawtthlêrahai chun tlûng an ta; chu ni chun a mi indo mihai po po khawm chu sukto ṭawk ṭawk nîng an tih, LALPA chun a tih.
Ngai ta, nang ka dodâl che a nih, Aw nang mi chapo, LALPA, sipaihai LALPA chun a tih; i ni, ka hung hremna ding che ni chu a hung tlung mêk sih a.
Chun, mi chapo chu insui a ta, tlûng a tih, tukhawma ama chu keitho naw ni hai; a khawpuiahai chun mei sêm ka ta, ama vêla umhai po po chu kâng hmang vawng a tih.
“Sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Israel thlahai le Juda thla- hai chu nêksâwrin an um rêl a; anni sala mantuhai taphawt hlak chun an chel det tlat a, an infetir nuom nawh a.

Anni sanhimtu chu a hrât a, a hming khawm, sipaihai LALPA a nih, ama chun an chungthu chu ṭan tlat a ta; hnuoi chunga chun châwlna a pêk thei a, Babulon hluotuhai ruok chu a sukto ṭawkṭawk nawna dingin.
Kâwlhnâm chu Kaldaihai chunga dâm, Babulon hluotuhai chunga dâm, a rorêltuhai le a mivar- hai chunga chun a um a nih, LALPA chun a tih.
Chapohai chunga chun kâwl- hnâm chu a um a, invêtpui an ta, kâwlhnâm chu a mi thilthawtheihai chungah a um a, beidawng an tih.

Kâwlhnâm chu an sakawrhai chunga dâm, an sakawr tawlailîrhai chunga dâm, ama sûnga mi chilakhai po po chunga dâm chun a um a, chuongchun, anni chu nuhmei ang el nîng an ta, kâwlhnâm chu a ro inhai chunga chun a um a, inrûkin um a tih.
A tuihai chunga chun kangna a um a, kangchat an tih; milim ker- fâwm ram a na, milimah an invêt ri ngawt el a ni sih a.

“Chuleiin, thlalêr ramsa hrâng- hai chu sihalhai leh chutaka chun chêng an ta; vangalsânghai khawm chêng an ta; kumkhuoin hluo hrim hrim ni ta naw ni; suona inthawka suon dang chena khawm hluo ni naw ni.
Pathien chun Gomorra le Sodom le a vêl khuohai chu a pei thlâk lai ang khan, LALPA chun a tih: chutaka chun mi chêng naw ni hai a, mihriem nau tukhawm chutaka chun inzin khawm vân zin naw ni hai.
Ngai ta u, hmâr tienga in- thawkin hnam pakhat an hung a, hnam ropuitak el, lal tamtakhai le chun leihnuoi kilkhâwrtaka inthawk chen chun chawktho nîng an ta.

Anni chun thalngul le fei an chawi a; an rilo hle a, lunginsietna an nei nawh; an râwlhai chu tuisuoriet angin ân rûm a, sakawr chungahai chun an chuong a; Aw Babulon nau- nu, nangma chunga chun, indonaa mi angin, mi tin chu an intlar a nih.
Babulona lal chun an ri chu a lo hriet a, a kuthai chu a hung chau a, ama chu lunginzîngna chun a man tah a, nuhmei nauhase nat tuor angin a na tah a.

“Ngai ta u, umhmun det chu doin, Jordan chaponaa inthawk chun sakeibaknei angin hung suok a ta; amiruokchu, amaa inthawk chun intlânsiettir vak ka tih; chun mi ama chunga thunei ding chun ruot ka ta; kei ang hi tu am an um hrim a? Tuin am hun mi ruotpêk a ta? Berâm vêngtu ka hmaa ngîr ding chu tu am a na?

Chuleiin, Babulon chungthua LALPAIN thurâwn a nei chu lo ngai ta u, Kaldaihai ram chunga thiltum a nei tâk le chun. Matheiloin anni chu ran ruol têhai hnûkhmangin um ngei ngei an ta, an chêngna chu anni irâusanin siempêk a tih.
Babulon lâkna ria chun hnuoi chu ân thin a, hnamhai laia chun a khêk ri chu hrietin a um a,” tiin.
